scripts.build: npm test && npm run bundle && npm run minify
scripts.bundle: node_modules/.bin/browserify src/eqcol.js > dist/eqcol.js -t [ babelify --presets [es2015] --plugins [transform-object-assign] ] -s Eqcol && node_modules/.bin/browserify src/jquery-eqcol.js > dist/jquery-eqcol.js -t [ babelify --presets [es2015] --plugins [transform-object-assign] ] -s Eqcol
scripts.minify: node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs dist/eqcol.js > dist/eqcol.min.js -m && node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs dist/jquery-eqcol.js > dist/jquery-eqcol.min.js -m
